description:
Undeterred by Sumire`s coldness, Meguru continues to make friendly overtures to her at home and at school. Meguru`s discovery of an abandoned dog on the road turns out to be the spark for the two to spend more time together, and soon, they and Miruku are even taking their new pet to an animal show. However, the fun is interrupted by a mysterious new enemy...
Source: crunchyroll
